Regards,

Dina

Dear Investor,

 

It is very critical that Swarovski (G-11), L’Occitane en Provence (G-31A) and Make Up Forever (G-65) at Al Kout Mall should have valid Property All Risk, Third Party Liability & Workmen’s Compensation insurance policies in order to be complaint with Clause 6 of the signed Investment Agreement.

chunks.text:
It is very critical that Swarovski (G-11), L’Occitane en Provence (G-31A) and Make Up Forever (G-65) at Al Kout Mall should have valid Property All Risk, Third Party Liability & Workmen’s Compensation insurance policies in order to be complaint with Clause 6 of the signed Investment Agreement. 

 

You are kindly requested to submit the insurance copies by 10th September 2025.

 

Thanks & Regards,
